verses.name: Matthew 7:25
verses.text: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell not: for it was founded upon a rock.

verses.name: Matthew 7:26
verses.text: And every one that heareth these sayings of mine, and doeth them not, shall be likened unto a foolish man, which built his house upon the sand:

verses.name: Matthew 7:27
verses.text: And the rain descended, and the floods came, and the winds blew, and beat upon that house; and it fell: and great was the fall of it.

verses.name: Matthew 7:28
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Jesus had ended these sayings, the people were astonished at his doctrine:
